message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $95 for the product. I hope this works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I would like to stick to my original budget. I am willing to pay $100 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
